Hi guys, 
 
 As you may know, I am a Lecturer in Games Technology and as part of my teaching I have to learn different programming libraries/languages/APIs. As part of that learning process I usually try to create a breakout clone(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breakout).
 
 I have attached two versions one was created using C++ and SDL, and the other was created using C# and the XNA Framework. These demos where created in about 4 days each so they are rough versions that would require many man hours to turn them into a finished product.
 
 I am planning to fix the collision response and add more levels to both demos. Could you let me know if a)it works on your PC and b) Any general comments on the demo.
 
 Breakout SDL
 Breakout XNA
 
 Installation Instructions
 
 Unzip to any directory
 
 C++ SDL Breakout instructions
 Double click on Breakout.exe
 A key moves the bat left
 D key moves the bat right
 Spacebar starts the game
 
 C# XNA Breakout instructions
 Double click on BreakOut.exe
 Left Arrow key move the bat left
 Right Arrow key moves the bat right
 Spacebar starts the game 
 
 To uninstall just delete the directory that contains the exe files.
